markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, an educated noble disciple truly understands the origin, the ending, the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.”

SN.22.76. Arahantasutta (“The Perfected Ones”)
